input_files.name: expression_matrix
input_files.description: Expression matrix that contain normalized counts for each individual gene in each condition.
input_files.help: Columns are conditions and rows are genes.

input_files_combinations.description: Expression matrix that contain normalized counts.

arguments.name: reference_ids
arguments.description: Comma-delimited string indicating the ids of reference conditions.
arguments.help: Default is NULL. In that case the analysis will be performed for each condition without computing z-scores.

meta_data.description: For each condition, a list of predicted drugs from the most to the least effective.
